title: G4MF Model
description: A model is a reference to another self-contained file which can be imported as a node or tree of nodes and inserted into the G4MF scene. Models can be in various formats, such as G4MF, OFF, glTF, OCIF, or any other format.

bufferView.description: The index of the buffer view that contains the model data. This is a reference to a buffer view in the G4MF file's buffer views array.

mimeType.description: The MIME type, or media type, of the model file, which defines the format of the model. This is required and has no default value.

uri.description: The relative URI to the model file. This URI is relative to the G4MF file's location.
